title: Breaking boundaries: a novel role for CUC genes in sex determination in cucurbits
content: This article comments on:Segura M, García A, Gamarra G, Benítez A, Iglesias-Moya J, Martínez C, Jamilena M. 2024. An miR164-resistant mutation in the transcription factor gene CpCUC2B enhances carpel arrest and ectopic boundary specification in Cucurbita pepo flower development. Journal of Experimental Botany 75, 1948–1966.
siteTitle: Journal of Experimental Botany Current Issue
